hands are defiled with blood. In a specific sense, this passage may refer to bloodshed; in general, it refers to wickedness and sin.

hands/fingers/lips/tongue. These parts of the human body express the agency to act and to do wickedly. A fifth body part leads the people to evil: the feet (59:7). The hands that people use to reach out in pleading to God are the same hands they use to injure their fellowman; the same lips and tongue used in prayer for deliverance and blessing are those that speak deception (1:15; 5:7; 58:9).

perverseness. The New International Version reads this as "wicked things."
